name: Yeuma Inc
description:
Trend is building the world’s largest decentralized creative AI powered studio. Trend automates content creation for brands and replaces their creative agencies.

On track for generating $1m+ this year

Customers like Nestle, Huel, Unilever

Backed by Flybridge, Pharrell Williams, Techstars Ventures, founders of Twitch, Rotten Tomatoes, Kabam, Crunchyroll etc.
